/>
XIV.4.B.1.l
.
Tailgating or Piggybacking
Tailgating or piggybacking to gain unauthorized access to areas containing FTI is prohibited.  Only individuals with a
need to know
are allowed to access areas containing FTI.
Important
:  Unauthorized access must be challenged and reported immediately to a management official from the authorized area that contains FTI.  The management official must also notify station security personnel of the attempt to gain unauthorized access to an area containing FTI.
Note
:  Although individuals may have authorized access to areas containing FTI, access to FTI should be limited to a
need to know basis
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
